name: A Storm's Coming
description:
You're a long-distance trucker and have just arrived at your destination; a small town in Alaska. Except it seems no one is here to import your load. Actually it seems no one is here at all...

Atmospheric game set in a remote town in Alaska.  Unfortunately this game is not yet finished. There is still a path to follow with events and interactions but this is not a finalized game. I'd still appreciate any feedback, it should take about 3-5 minutes to play.
